definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: perpetuity, antiquity (v. BH III. [[עלם]], [[עוֹלָם]]);—´[[ע]]: abs. Da 3:33 +, cstr. Da 7:18; emph. [[עָֽלְמָא]] Da 2:20 +; pl. [[עָֽלְמִין]] Da 2:4 +, emph. [[עָֽלְמַיׇּא]] Da 2:44, Da 7:18;—perpetuity in the future: ´[[מַלְכוּת ע]]: Da 3:33, Da 7:27, cf. Da 4:31, Da 7:14; ´[[ע]]: as adv. for ever Da 4:31; [[עַד־עָֽלְמָא]] [[וְעַד־עָלַם עָֽלְמַיׇּא]] Da 7:18; pl. ´[[לְע]]: for ever Da 2:4, Da 2:44, Da 2:44, Da 3:9, Da 5:10, Da 6:7, Da 6:22, Da 6:27; antiquity, [[מִן־יוֹמָת עָֽלְמָא]] Ezr 4:15, Ezr 4:19; of limitless time both past and future: ´[[וְעַד־ע]] :´[[מִן־ע]]: Da 2:20.
